summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Game Control Modal and WhatsApp Control endpoints. All backend APIs (15/15) passed. Frontend UI testing verified all 4 tabs (Info, Tickets, WhatsApp, Logs) with proper data display and button states.
passed_tests: Admin login authentication with valid credentials
Admin login rejection with invalid credentials
GET /api/admin/games/{game_id}/control returns all required sections (game, ticket_summary, bookings, whatsapp_status, whatsapp_logs, control_logs, has_sold_tickets)
Control endpoint returns 404 for non-existent game
Control endpoint requires admin authentication (401 for unauthenticated)
POST /api/admin/games/{game_id}/whatsapp/booking-confirmation requires booking_id
Booking confirmation returns 404 for invalid booking_id
POST /api/admin/games/{game_id}/whatsapp/game-reminder returns 404 for non-existent game
Game reminder returns 400 when no confirmed bookings exist
Game reminder returns 400 when game is outside 24hr window
POST /api/admin/games/{game_id}/whatsapp/join-link returns 404 for non-existent game
Join link returns 404 for non-existent user
Join link requires user_id parameter
Control data correctly reflects ticket sales (total, booked, confirmed, revenue)
WhatsApp and control logs have correct structure (arrays)
UI: Game Control Modal opens from admin panel via Control button
UI: Info tab shows game details (name, date, time, price, prize pool, prizes) - read-only
UI: Info tab shows LIVE status badge for live games
UI: Tickets tab shows ticket sales summary (Total Tickets, Booked, Confirmed, Revenue)
UI: Tickets tab shows Sales Progress bar
UI: Tickets tab shows Bookings list (empty state: 'No bookings yet')
UI: WhatsApp tab shows WhatsApp Business Policy banner
UI: WhatsApp tab shows Game Reminder section with button
UI: Game Reminder button shows 'Not Available (24hr window)' when game is not within 24 hours
UI: WhatsApp tab shows Player Actions section (empty state: 'No bookings to message')
UI: Logs tab shows WhatsApp Messages section
UI: Logs tab shows Activity Log section
UI: All 4 tabs (Info, Tickets, WhatsApp, Logs) are clickable and display correct content
seed_data_creation: Test games created during backend testing (prefixed with 'Control Test Game', 'Reminder Test Game', 'Future Game') - automatically cleaned up after tests
context_for_next_testing_agent: Game Control Modal testing complete. The modal has 4 tabs: Info (read-only game details), Tickets (sales summary with progress bar), WhatsApp (Game Reminder button with 24hr window check, Player Actions for individual messages), and Logs (WhatsApp Messages and Activity Log). All WhatsApp control endpoints work correctly with proper validation: booking-confirmation requires confirmed booking and can only be sent once, game-reminder requires 24hr window and can only be sent once, join-link can be resent. The test game 'Auto-Start Test Game 013955' is LIVE with no bookings, so Player Actions shows 'No bookings to message' and Game Reminder shows 'Not Available (24hr window)'.
